name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The video has been deleted

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 20, Hangzhou Xiasha Yunxue Academy.
A landlord broke into the tenant's house and beat to death and dismembered two legal pets (I won't post the video).
The police refused to file a case on the grounds of "insufficient conditions".
This sudden campaign-style law enforcement without any public documents has become a dynamic zeroing out of cats and dogs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/9sPVtIhXLP

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 20, Nike Greater China recently issued an internal letter announcing the launch of a new hybrid work model.
Under the new model, employees will work four days a week in the company, from Monday to Thursday. The new work model will be officially implemented on January 8, 2024, and will only be limited to office staff.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: I feel like I could write a novel.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 20, at Siyuan Senior High School in Chengmai County, Hainan Province, a parent held up a banner claiming that the school's principal surnamed Wang had raped his 9-year-old daughter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 21, a puppy was hanged in the street at Liaoning Advertising Vocational College.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 20, a man in Zhengzhou escaped from the arrest of the urban management while holding his dog

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Sympathy for the slaughter of stray dogs does not mean opposition to the management of stray dogs. This is a question that needs to be clarified. Before dealing with stray animals and so-called banned animals, have plans been made, including humane handling procedures and mechanisms for preventing and controlling the spread of viruses that may be caused by large-scale slaughter? It seems that there is no plan now, it is just a campaign-style law enforcement and an inhumane slaughter to vent anger. …

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: By the way, think about where some of these captured and slaughtered animals end up.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 21, Nanluoguxiang subway entrance.
Two girls hold signs to call for action against animal abuse

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 21, Hengshui, Hebei.
The middle school stipulates that the meal time is only 20 minutes.
As a result, students have to run to grab food after class, which is criticized as inhumane.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 21, some media reported that many places have opened targeted recruitment for returned overseas students and they will be considered civil servants after being recruited, which has aroused the dissatisfaction of many netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Current flood conditions in Huazhou City, Guangdong Province, October 21

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 21, water situation in Maoming, Guangdong

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added that the schools in the Hengshui system are similar, and students often need to run for three or even six years just to make a living.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: To stimulate Double 11 consumption this year, Alipay provides a "pay back next year" service, whereby consumption during Double 11 can be deferred until January 24.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 19, a boy in Zhejiang was caught playing with his mobile phone during class by his teacher, who choked him twice when the teacher tried to take the phone back.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 21, a person jumped from a building at Joy City in Chaoyang District, Beijing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 21, the husband of a teacher of ideological and political education at Beijing University of Chemical Technology accused Dean Ma Yuan of sexually harassing his wife in a corporate WeChat group, asking her to accompany him for drinking, and removing her from the work group.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 21, a street vendor encountered violent law enforcement in front of a school in Beijing, and his stall was overturned.

content:
On October 21, Henan Province Shangqiu City
Depositors of Henan Village Bank held their eleventh rights protection protest in Henan

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[Don’t let the supervision become headless news]
Some netizens found that the State Council has supervised the collapse of the gymnasium of Qiqihar No. 34 Middle School for more than the stipulated 60 days.
According to regulations, provincial people’s governments should complete supervision matters within 60 days after receiving the notice of supervision.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 20, all bus operators in Bayuquan District, Yingkou City, Liaoning Province announced that all buses in the district will be suspended from November 1.
